00022 #include "whiptk/whip_toolkit.h"
00023 #include "whiptk/w2d_class_factory.h"
00024 
00025 extern WT_File *whip_file; //Assume this has been opened for writing elsewhere.
00026 
00027 WT_Result OutlineEllipse()
00028 {
00029     WT_W2D_Class_Factory cf;
00030 
00031     int major = 110;
00032     int minor = 75;
00033     int x=0,y=0;
00034 
00035     //Create an outline ellipse
00036     WT_Outline_Ellipse *ellipse = cf.Create_Outline_Ellipse(x, y, major, minor);
00037     if (ellipse == NULL)
00038         return WT_Result::Out_Of_Memory_Error;
00039     //Serialize it.
00040     WD_CHECK(ellipse->serialize (*whip_file));
00041     cf.Destroy( ellipse );
00042 
00043     return WT_Result::Success;
00044 }
